content: the **wheat stitch™ rectangle bag** is the perfect project for adventurous beginners ready to try something beautiful and practical featuring the stunning wheat stitch a textured eye-catching design this accessory is worked up simply as a rectangle that s right just crochet a rectangle fold it sew up two seams and attach a handle voilà you ve made a chic handmade bag the pattern includes two versatile sizes small and large so you can choose the perfect fit for your lifestyle crafted with soft sturdy worsted-weight cotton-blend yarn this bag is both stylish and durable ideal for everyday adventures or thoughtful handmade gifts a video tutorial is included with the pattern 1 crochet hook g 4 00mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notions removable stitch markers 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 faux leather snap 6 sewing thread & needle 7 yarn herrschners cottage cotton 8 60% cotton/40% acrylic blend 207yds/100g yardage small shown in oceanside 475yds 3 balls large shown in oyster bay 630yds 4 balls yarn substitutions wecrochet comfy worsted 9 75% pima cotton/25% acrylic 109yds/50g lion brand made with love 10 60% cotton/40% acrylic 185yds/100g dishie 11 100% cotton 190yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain s - chain s single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es gauge 18 sts and 14 row = 4 by 4 not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 12 sizes 2 sizes small and large skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 13 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 14 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 15 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 16 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 17 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 18 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=mvs09hblbr4 2 https //shrsl com/3vjm6 3 https //shrsl com/3xv7g 4 https //shrsl com/2bor2 5 https //shrsl com/2cibs 6 https //amzn to/3x1vgtz 7 https //amzn to/4m77kih 8 https //shrsl com/4vdnv 9 https //shrsl com/3a7sp 10 https //shrsl com/4e60p 11 https //shrsl com/2wlcn 12 https //brianakdesigns com/what-is-crochet-gauge-and-how-to-fix-it/ 13 http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 https //www facebook com/groups/brianak 17 https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw
